intent: Prevent authority confusion by forcing every run to inspect /mnt/data Project Files, resolve Project Index boot order, and refuse inference-first behavior.

rules.name: Authority First
rules.policy: If Project Files exist, they are the sole source of truth for active OS state. Never infer boot target without checking.

rules.name: Bootloader Gate
rules.policy: Always load MetaBlooms_PROJECT_INDEX_P0.mips.json first (if present). If missing, require explicit user instruction before proceeding.

rules.name: Pack Resolution
rules.policy: Resolve boot sequence to concrete pack filenames; ensure each exists; record load order. If any are missing, stop and report missing list.

rules.name: Integrity Gate
rules.policy: If Project Index provides hashes, verify them. If hashes unavailable, compute and record sha256 for boot artifacts in a boot snapshot.

rules.name: Delta Stack Gate
rules.policy: Enumerate MetaBlooms_DELTA_*.mips.json in Project Files and present a concise applied-stack view. Never assume a delta is applied unless present.

rules.name: Session Output Contract
rules.policy: Every major action must emit: (a) artifact, (b) 1-line burndown, (c) evidence note with hashes where relevant.

recommended_next_ops.name: Daily Interface Command Set
recommended_next_ops.what: Define 5 short commands that query the booted OS state (core, deltas, packs, recent changes, deploy receipts).

recommended_next_ops.name: Release Lane
recommended_next_ops.what: Establish a release cadence: each major change = DELTA + manifest; weekly = deploy ZIP + manifest.

rollback.how: Remove this DELTA from Project Files to revert to prior behavior.
